{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.02514v1", "title": "The Discriminant of the Characteristic Polynomial of the $k$th Fibonacci
  sequence is not a member of the $k$th Lucas sequence", "summary": "Let $k\ge 2$ and $\{L_n^{(k)}\}_{n\geq 2-k}$ be the sequence of
$k$-generalized Lucas numbers whose first $k$ terms are $0,\ldots,0,2,1$ and
each term afterwards is the sum of the preceding $k$ terms. In this paper, we
show that this sequence does not contain the discriminant of its characteristic
polynomial.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-04-03T11:59:52Z"}
